item.title: NPC trouble
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

Can anyone lemme know why this doesn’t work and maybe have an idea to make it work? It’s supposed to summon a tree spirit, have him say leave this place mortal, and stat attacking the player. Right now it summons it and doesn’t do anything else.

SummonNewNPC(438); server.npcHandler.npcs[438].textUpdate = "Leave this place mortal!"; server.npcHandler.npcs[438].StartKilling = playerId; server.npcHandler.npcs[438].RandomWalk = false; server.npcHandler.npcs[438].IsUnderAttack = true;

Read full topic
